com.tiyb.tev.xml

Class BlogXmlWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiyb.tev.xml.BlogXmlWriter

  • public final class BlogXmlWriter
extends Object

    Helper class used for generating an XML file, in the same format as the Tumblr export, so that posts can be imported on other sides (e.g. WordPress). Because the user can select which posts they want to export, the export file will contain only the posts that the user wants to export (and therefore import somewhere else), rather than the entire blog.

    The Java StAX library is used for generating the XML content.

    Author:
    tiyb

    • Method Detail

      • getStagedPostXMLForBlog

        public static String getStagedPostXMLForBlog(List<String> postIDs,
                                             TEVPostRestController postController,
                                             String blogName)

        Takes in a list of Post IDs, and returns an XML document (String format) containing the data for those posts. A Post REST controller is used to get the data from the database; all the method needs is the list of IDs.

        This method doesn't do much, other than retrieve the Post data from the REST controller for each post. The getDocument() method (and subsequent, type-specific methods) do most of the work.

        Parameters:
        postIDs - List of Post IDs to include in the export, regardless of type (photo, video, answer, link, regular)
        postController - The REST controller for working with Posts
        blogName - Blog for which posts should be retrieved
        Returns:
        String containing the XML document

      • getDocument

        private static String getDocument(List<Post> posts,
                                  TEVPostRestController postController,
                                  String blogName)

        This method starts the work of creating the outer shell of the document. The addPost() method starts adding in the detailed data, post-by-post. The PrettyPrintHandler helper class is used to create a more readable version of the XML output.

        This method also handles any exceptions that might have been raised by sub-methods; when an exception is encountered, it is logged, and NULL is returned for the response.

        Parameters:
        posts - The list of posts to be included in the export.
        postController - The REST controller, to be used for getting additional data
        blogName - Name of the blog for which the document is being returned
        Returns:
        String containing the XML document

      • addPost

        private static void addPost(Post post,
                            XMLStreamWriter writer,
                            TEVPostRestController postController,
                            String blogName)
                     throws XMLStreamException
        Creates the wrapper XML for each post -- including attributes -- and then calls sub-methods for each individual type of post (regular, photo, answer, etc.).
        Parameters:
        post - The post to be written to XML
        writer - The StAX XML writer to which the data should be written
        postController - The REST controller for getting additional post information from the DB
        blogName - Blog for which the post is being added
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException - if any errors are encountered by the StAX parser.

      • addPhotoBody

        private static void addPhotoBody(Post post,
                                 XMLStreamWriter writer,
                                 TEVPostRestController postController,
                                 String blogName)
                          throws XMLStreamException
        Adds a Photo post to the XML. The addPhotoWithSizes() helper method is used to insert the XML tags for different sizes of photo.
        Parameters:
        post - The post being added, with one or more photos
        writer - The StAX XML writer
        postController - The REST controller for retrieving additional data
        blogName - Blog for which the photo si being added
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException - if any errors are encountered by the underlying StAX classes

      • addPhotoWithSizes

        private static void addPhotoWithSizes(Photo photo,
                                      XMLStreamWriter writer)
                               throws XMLStreamException
        Helper function for adding a photo-url element to the XML, since these are added multiple times per photo.
        Parameters:
        photo - The specific photo being written
        writer - The StAX XML writer
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException - if any errors are encountered by the underlying StAX objects

      • addVideoBody

        private static void addVideoBody(Post post,
                                 XMLStreamWriter writer,
                                 TEVPostRestController postController)
                          throws XMLStreamException
        Adds the XML for a video to the export. This method isn't fully functioning, as video posts require some XML elements which were not included in the original import into the TEV database; for this reason, the UI is currently blocking users from adding video posts to the staging area.
        Parameters:
        post - The post to be written to the XML
        writer - The StAX XML writer
        postController - The REST controller for getting additional data
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException - if any errors are encountered by the underlying StAX objects
